Torture Team tells the story of attorney Philippe Sands ' investigation of Donald Rumsfeld 's 2002 memo, authorizing the new interrogation techniques that led to torture at Guantanamo Bay and beyond. May well be the best bit of contemporary investigative journalism you will read: it is right up there with Woodward and Bernstein, a tour de force of relentlessly dogged pursuit, of interviews with guilty men acquired against all odds, a beautifully told and humane narrative that follows a paper trail and nails the truth, according to the Sunday Times in the United Kingdom.
